html.h2: Example 1: Log all processes with additional information
html.p: The following inputs.conf example logs an event per process every 5 minutes using the sourcetype "Windows:Process".

code.pre: [powershell://Processes] script = Get-Process | | Select-Object Handles, NPM, PM, WS, VM, Id, ProcessName, @{n="SplunkHost";e={$Env:SPLUNK_SERVER_NAME}} schedule = 0 */5 * ? * * sourcetype = Windows:Process
